responses.gpt4: That's great to hear, Patient. Adherence to your prescribed medications is vital in managing your conditions. Have you ever had trouble remembering to take your medications on time?
responses.our_model: That's great to hear. It's essential to take your medication as prescribed to help manage your alcohol use disorder. I understand that it can be challenging to remember to take medications on time. Do you ever have trouble remembering to take your medications?
